New Tab Unlimited Bookmarks

1. Readme

New Tab Unlimited Bookmarks is a Chrome extension that helps you be more productive.
It lets you add and customize an unlimited number of bookmarks, so your favorite links are instantly available every time you open a new tab.

2. Setup

You need to configure your bookmarks source first:

  1. Check your Bookmarks bar, locate a folder that you want to show on your Chrome's Start page. If not visible, press CTRL + SHIFT + B on Windows, âŒ˜ + SHIFT + B on Mac.
  2. Create or choose an existing bookmark folder. (eg. development)
  3. Go to ⚙ Settings button below and add the name of that folder from Step 2. Save settings.

3. Enjoy!

Now everytime you open a new tab, you will see your bookmarks from the folder that you picked on Step 2. You can always configure this via Settings link which is located on the bottom center of the tab's content.
